scenes.title: [VR] Shared Room - Drunken Reverse NTR - When Drunk, a Cute New Employee Becomes a Kisser and Lasciviously Fucked Me on the Night of the Business Trip miru
scenes.synopsis: I was unexpectedly sharing a room with a cute new employee... She gets close to me and asks me “Don't you want to kiss me?” when she's tipsy! She is a very innocent looking girl and she is actually a kisser. She is a kisser and an aggressive slut...! She kisses him so hard and makes him scream in agony... I want to ejaculate because it feels so good! But I don't want it to end! The positions of boss and subordinate are completely reversed! I want to taste such a lucky sketch just once....
